name: SystemicLupusErythematosus
title: Systemic Lupus Erythematosus
description: This value set has not been tested in a clinical environment. Please use with caution.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) diagnosis codes),(Data Element Scope: SNOMED CT disorder codes that represent evidence of SLE in a patient's medical record.),(Inclusion Criteria: SLE SNOMED CT disorder codes, including disorder codes for complications of SLE (e.g., SLE glomerulonephritis syndrome, rash of SLE).),(Exclusion Criteria: Drug-induced SLE and other forms/types of lupus (e.g., discoid lupus erythematosus). Non "disorder" codes.)
